resources.string:
Hi, my name is Fikri. 

I love reading. 

The kind of books that is about history and international policy. 
Fun fact is that I have several hobbies. 

I like playing game, too. Skyrim. Genshin Impact. Muse Dash. and many else. 
And sometimes I even go jogging outside. 
And even less sometimes, I actually learn japanese. 

Once, when I was learning in my room, and very agile, I even caught a rare item myself. 

I'll be happy to teach you how to good at translating. 
You should ask someone else about speaking, though.
